title: Bank charges 3 euros per month for their service, are service charges riba? assimalhakeem JAL
transcript: i'm from bosnia hey i have a bank account where people could pay me but the bank charges me with around three euros per month for their service and package so i'm wondering is this reba or interest i should also mention that right now it is not a real necessity for me so i get paid like once in a blue moon so is this rib anyways hamza from bosnia he says his bank takes three euros every month from him is this answer is no this is their service charge charges as you live in a flat or an apartment and they take rent from you this is the same thing
